title: refactor(http-server-connections): document justification for single-use connection_setup_body_buffer
body:
## Summary

The connection_setup_body_buffer function is called only once (line 507) and is 52 lines long.

## Location
File: src/http/SocketHTTPServer-connections.c
Function: connection_setup_body_buffer
Lines: 192-245
Called at: connection_parse_request (line 507)

## Pattern
SINGLE_USE_REVIEW (MEDIUM severity)

## Recommendation
Keep as separate function due to size (52 lines), but add documentation explaining why it's not reused elsewhere.
